meanings.definition: A group of fungi that produce spores on basidia.
meanings.sent1: Basidiomycetes are fungi that make spores on special structures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study basidiomycetes to learn more about fungi.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycetes had a party and invited all the other fungi.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, basidiomycetes spread their spores like tiny fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycetes in the garden were as colorful as a rainbow.

meanings.definition: Fungi belonging to the class Basidiomycetes.
meanings.sent1: I found a basidiomycetes mushroom during my nature walk.
meanings.sent2: Basidiomycetes are an important part of the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycetes in the classroom were the teacher's favorite.
meanings.sent4: The basidiomycetes in the field danced in the wind like delicate ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycetes in the forest whispered secrets to the trees.
